origins.human_origin.summary: A regular human. Your ordinary Minecraft experience awaits.
origins.arachnid_origin.summary: Many legs and many eyes - with the spiders on their side, best not to get too close.
origins.arachnid_origin.climb.title: Creepy Crawly
origins.arachnid_origin.climb.desc: You can climb on any surface.
You can move in and climb on cobwebs freely, as they do not affect you.
origins.arachnid_origin.grapple.title: Grapple
origins.arachnid_origin.grapple.desc: You can shoot webs onto blocks or mobs to grapple onto or swing from them.
origins.arachnid_origin.species.title: Arachnid Species
origins.arachnid_origin.species.desc: You are friendly with the spiders and cave spiders and they will fight for you.
origins.arachnid_origin.poison.title: Poison
origins.arachnid_origin.poison.desc: Your ranged attacks deal poison, and you are immune to it.
origins.arachnid_origin.bane_of_arthropo: You are more vulnerable to the Bane of Arthropods enchantment.
origins.arachnid_origin.health.title: Lower Health
origins.elytrian_origin.summary: Often flying around in the winds, Elytrians are uncomfortable when they don't have enough space above their head.
origins.elytrian_origin.winged.title: Winged
origins.elytrian_origin.winged.desc: You have Elytra wings without needing to equip any.
origins.elytrian_origin.mobility.title: Flight Mobility
origins.elytrian_origin.mobility.desc: You can flap your wings to move faster or higher.
origins.elytrian_origin.extra_damage.des: You deal substantially more damage while in the air.
origins.elytrian_origin.super_boost.desc: Every 60 seconds, you are able to launch very high into the air.
origins.elytrian_origin.experience.title: Experience Boost
origins.elytrian_origin.experience.desc: The higher your experience level, the faster you fly.
origins.elytrian_origin.lightness.title: Need for Mobility
origins.elytrian_origin.lightness.desc: The heavier your armor, the slower you fly.
origins.elytrian_origin.claustrophobia.d: Being under a low ceiling will make you slower and weaker.
origins.elytrian_origin.lightning.title: Living Lightning Rod
origins.elytrian_origin.lightning.desc: Lightning is more likely to strike you when you are flying through a thunderstorm.
origins.enderian_origin.summary: Born as children of the End, Enderians are capable of teleporting but are vulnerable to water.
origins.enderian_origin.teleportation.de: Whenever you want, you may throw an ender pearl which deals no damage, allowing you to teleport.
origins.enderian_origin.reach.title: Slender Body
origins.enderian_origin.reach.desc: You can reach blocks and entities further away.
origins.enderian_origin.hydrophobia.desc: You are damaged over time while in contact with water or rain.
origins.enderian_origin.species.title: Enderman Species
origins.enderian_origin.species.desc: You are friendly with the endermen and they will fight for you.
origins.enderian_origin.pumpkin.title: Fear of Gourds
origins.enderian_origin.pumpkin.desc: You are scared of pumpkins, for a good reason...
origins.phoenix_origin.summary: Death and rebirth for a thousand years... Which came first? The phoenix or the flame?
origins.phoenix_origin.rebirth.title: From the Ashes
origins.phoenix_origin.rebirth.desc: For most deaths, you respawn where you die, instead of at spawn or at a bed.
origins.phoenix_origin.winged.title: Winged
origins.phoenix_origin.winged.desc: You have Elytra wings without needing to equip any.
origins.phoenix_origin.fire_immunity.des: You take no damage from fire, and 2x less damage from lava. You can summon fire onto nearby entities.
origins.phoenix_origin.drowning_damage.d: You slowly take damage while in water, and you take 50% more drowning damage.
origins.shark_origin.summary: These natural inhabitants of the ocean can't stray from the water for too long.
origins.shark_origin.gills.title: Gills
origins.shark_origin.gills.desc: You can breathe underwater, but not on land. When raining, you can get out of water for a short time.
origins.shark_origin.mobility.title: Fins
origins.shark_origin.mobility.desc: You can travel incredibly fast underwater, if you know how.
origins.shark_origin.riptide.title: Jet-stream
origins.shark_origin.riptide.desc: You can charge up a riptide move when swimming.
origins.shark_origin.trident.title: Trident Expert
origins.shark_origin.trident.desc: You deal more damage with tridents and you can use them faster.
origins.shark_origin.water_vision.title: Wet Eyes
origins.shark_origin.water_vision.desc: Your vision underwater is perfect, but not so much on land.
origins.slimician_origin.summary: Part human, part slime. Very unpleasant to touch.
origins.slimician_origin.bounce.title: The Bounce Bros
origins.slimician_origin.bounce.desc: You bounce on any block as if it was a Slime Block. You can gain infinite height by timing your jump.
origins.slimician_origin.shrink.title: Fragmentation
origins.slimician_origin.shrink.desc: When others would die, you shrink to half your size (Twice per life). The smaller you are, the less reach, health, and attack damage you have, but the bouncier you are.
origins.slimician_origin.species.title: Slime Species
origins.slimician_origin.species.desc: You are friendly with the slimes and they will fight for you.
origins.fox_origin.stealth.title: Fox Stealth
origins.fox_origin.stealth.desc: After crouching still for a couple of seconds, you become camouflaged.
origins.fox_origin.scram.title: Scram!
origins.fox_origin.scram.desc: Whenever your health goes below 4 hearts, you gain a small speed boost.
origins.fox_origin.no_fall_damage.title: Acrobatics
origins.fox_origin.no_fall_damage.desc: You never take fall damage, no matter from which height you fall.
origins.fox_origin.health.title: Less Health
origins.fox_origin.night_vision.title: Nocturnal
origins.fox_origin.night_vision.desc: You can see in the dark.
origins.fox_origin.berries.title: Berry Craver
origins.fox_origin.species.title: Fox Species
origins.fox_origin.species.desc: You are friendly with the foxes and they will fight for you.
multiplayer.disconnect.mod_not_found: You don't have the origins mod! Download the correct version and try again.
multiplayer.disconnect.incorrect_mod_ver: You have the wrong origins version: '%1$s'. Try downloading version '%2$s' and restarting Minecraft.
origins.multiplayer.origins_mod_not_foun: You don't have the origins mod! Download the correct version and try again.
origins.multiplayer.incorrect_origins_mo: You have the wrong origins version: Install the correct version and relaunch Minecraft.
death.attack.touchingWater: %1$s took a bath for too long
death.attack.touchingWater.player: %1$s took a bath for too long whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.drinkingWater.player: %1$s drank too much water whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.indirectTouchingWater.playe: %1$s was bathed by %2$s for too long
death.attack.scare.player: %1$s was scared to death whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.dehydration.player: %1$s died from dehydration whilst trying to escape %2$s
